div.ab: To make this quickly, redden the filings in an iron case, stirring it often. Then sprinkle it with good vinegar & let it evaporate, & without removing it from atop the fire, let it redden & inflame. Once cooled, pulverize it on marble & return it to the fire, rou sprinkle with vinegar, and then inflame. Thus it will quickly be colored & made fine.
